title: The Black Book (ZwartBoek) 2006. DvDrip.Avi
description:
THE BLACK BOOK (ZWARTBOEK) 2006 DvDrip.Avi
Genre: Drama | Thriller | War
To fight the enemy, she must become one of them.

Set in Nazi-occupied Holland during World War II, the film centers around a young Jewish woman named Rachel, who enters an odyssey of determination and sheer luck in an effort to survive what would otherwise be certain death.

This movie, directed by Paul Verhoeven who directed "Total Recall" and "Basic Instinct", is a gripping, edge-of-your-seat World War II yarn.  The lush visuals, orchestral music, European styling, wartime romanticism and cliffhanging chapters all add a certain 1950's charm to the white-knuckle plot. So much of this film relies on surprises and shocking twists that it would be unfair  to detail too many plot threads.  I can only say that this thoughtful, poignant and tremendously rousing adventure -   a thrill ride from start to finish ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ will leave you breathless.  The ensamble cast of this film deliver wonderful performances, especially Carice Van Houten, the magnificent and talented Dutch beauty who plays the lead. 

Nominated for 20087 BAFTA (British Academy Film Award) in the category Best Film not in the English Language and the 2007 British Independent Film Award in the category Best Foreign Independent Film.

Runtime: 145 minutes
Langages: English is spoken in the film as well as Dutch, German and Hebrew (with English subtitles)
This film was made in The Netherlands
